Class Login

  • java.lang.Object
    • x464010.teamb.srs.Console

  • public class Login
extends Console
    The Login class prompts the student to enter credentials, validate them and redirects to appropriate console.

    1.6
    Author:
    Rebecca Chappel, Amit Dhamija
